participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about culture, and adventurous.
participant_1.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i'm an art major in college. i visit europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.background: my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i'm close to. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.
